title: Font or hand-lettering?
content:
Saw this on a residential building in Berlin recently. Is it a font, or custom hand-lettering?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416050850im_/http:/typophile.com/files/buergermeister_4168.png)

I might be tempted to make a font of it once I get Maestrale and Numina out.
author: Catharsis

comments.content: All repeating characters are exactly the same, so I would go with font; unfortunately, with all of the do-it-yourself-from-your-own-handwriting fonts out there, I haven't a clue as to which font it is...

Nice.

If it's made of ribbons of metal, it's probably a one-off (not really a font).

hhp
